step_assist.description: The range from the top or bottom of a block at which this power will correct the entity's orientation.
step_assist.markdownDescription: The range from the top or bottom of a block at which this power will correct the entity's orientation.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md).

Multiplies the Y velocity of the entity by 0, effectively making them stationary on the Y axis.

Type ID: `apugli:hover`
